price: Wala hakuwa nacho kikundi cha kumsaidia badala ya Mwenyezi Mungu, wala mwenyewe hakuweza kujisaidia.
arabic: وَلَمۡ تَكُن لَّهُۥ فِئَةٞ يَنصُرُونَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانَ مُنتَصِرًا
footnotes: Katika balaa hii hakuwa na jamaa wa kuja mnusuru badala ya Mwenyezi Mungu kama alivyo kuwa akijitapa. Wala hakuwa anaweza kujisaidia nafsi yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walam takun lahu fi-atun yanṣurūnahu min dūni al-lahi wamā kāna muntaṣiran
